ABOUT THIS GAME

During a strong magnetic storm , you have failed to infinity ...
You woke up , but amnesia has become your companion. Now you must explore the world around them. Some force is pushing you so you rise higher and higher.
Suddenly you see a huge tower in the fog . You feel that if you want to get answers to your questions ... you'll have to climb it .
Will make it easy. Tower protects modern security system , consisting of complex mechanisms , deadly lasers and robots that are constantly watching you .
If you want to survive , you need to use their skills ( jump, double jump, leap , and so on . .) And such weapons as " Switch " , by which is possible to activate or deactivate the trap and robots. The only way you can get to the top of the tower , and uncover the mystery of its origin.
